      Instantiate (as needed) and return objects that implement each of the services exported by this module.
      void init(FloodlightModuleContext context)
      This is a hook for each module to do its internal initialization, e.g., call setService(context.getService("Service")) All module dependencies are resolved when this is called, but not every module is initialized.
      void registerShutdownListener(IShutdownListener listener)
      Register a shutdown listener.
      void startUp(FloodlightModuleContext context)
      This is a hook for each module to do its external initializations, e.g., register for callbacks or query for state in other modules It is expected that this function will not block and that modules that want non-event driven CPU will spawn their own threads.
      void terminate(java.lang.String reason, int exitCode)
      Terminate floodlight process by calling System.exit() with the given exitCode.
      void terminate(java.lang.String reason, java.lang.Throwable e, int exitCode)
      Terminate floodlight process by calling System.exit() with the given exitCode.

      • getModuleServices

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IFloodlightService>> getModuleServices()
        从接口复制的说明: IFloodlightModule
        Return the list of interfaces that this module implements. All interfaces must inherit IFloodlightService
        指定者:
        getModuleServices 在接口中 IFloodlightModule
        返回:

      • getServiceImpls

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.Class<? extends IFloodlightService>,IFloodlightService> getServiceImpls()
        从接口复制的说明: IFloodlightModule
        Instantiate (as needed) and return objects that implement each of the services exported by this module. The map returned maps the implemented service to the object. The object could be the same object or different objects for different exported services.
        指定者:
        getServiceImpls 在接口中 IFloodlightModule
        返回:
        The map from service interface class to service implementation

      • getModuleDependencies

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<? extends IFloodlightService>> getModuleDependencies()
        从接口复制的说明: IFloodlightModule
        Get a list of Modules that this module depends on. The module system will ensure that each these dependencies is resolved before the subsequent calls to init().
        指定者:
        getModuleDependencies 在接口中 IFloodlightModule
        返回:
        The Collection of IFloodlightServices that this module depends on.

      • init

        public void init(FloodlightModuleContext context)
          throws FloodlightModuleException
        从接口复制的说明: IFloodlightModule
        This is a hook for each module to do its internal initialization, e.g., call setService(context.getService("Service")) All module dependencies are resolved when this is called, but not every module is initialized.
        指定者:
        init 在接口中 IFloodlightModule
        抛出:
        FloodlightModuleException

      • startUp

        public void startUp(FloodlightModuleContext context)
             throws FloodlightModuleException
        从接口复制的说明: IFloodlightModule
        This is a hook for each module to do its external initializations, e.g., register for callbacks or query for state in other modules It is expected that this function will not block and that modules that want non-event driven CPU will spawn their own threads.
        指定者:
        startUp 在接口中 IFloodlightModule
        抛出:
        FloodlightModuleException

      • registerShutdownListener

        public void registerShutdownListener(@Nonnull
                                     IShutdownListener listener)
        从接口复制的说明: IShutdownService
        Register a shutdown listener. Registered listeners are called when floodlight is about to terminate due to a call to terminate()
        指定者:
        registerShutdownListener 在接口中 IShutdownService

      • terminate

        public void terminate(@Nullable
                      java.lang.String reason,
                      int exitCode)
        从接口复制的说明: IShutdownService
        Terminate floodlight process by calling System.exit() with the given exitCode. If reason is non-null, reason will be logged. Before terminating the shutdownListeners are called If exitCode == 0 the termination cause is deemed "normal" and info level log is used. In all other cases the exit is abnormal and an error is logged.
        指定者:
        terminate 在接口中 IShutdownService

      • terminate

        public void terminate(java.lang.String reason,
                      java.lang.Throwable e,
                      int exitCode)
        从接口复制的说明: IShutdownService
        Terminate floodlight process by calling System.exit() with the given exitCode. If reason is non-null, reason will be logged. In addition, the throwable will be logged as well. Before terminating the shutdownListeners are called This method is generally used to terminate floodlight due to an unhandled Exception. As such all messages are logged as error and it is recommended that an exitCode != 0 is used.
        指定者:
        terminate 在接口中 IShutdownService
        e - The throwable causing floodlight to terminate
